name: ngx-agora
description: Angular wrapper for Agora RTC client (https://www.agora.io/en/)

scripts.copy:files: ditto schematics/src/ng-add/* ../../dist/ngx-agora/schematics/ng-add/ && ditto schematics/src/util/* ../../dist/ngx-agora/schematics/util/ && ditto schematics/src/collection.json ../../dist/ngx-agora/schematics/
scripts.postbuild: mkdir ../../dist/ngx-agora/schematics && npm run copy:files && npm run copy:schemas && npm run copy:collection

author: Drew Thompson
